<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Positive Luminance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3464) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 25</row>

**Archetype** [Hallowed Necromancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=172)

**Prerequisites**
[Hallowed Necromancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3459)

</column>

---

You learn how to create a luminous reservoir of positive energy that you can use to punish undead who dare attack you. You gain the domain spell [_positive luminance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=439). It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell. This feat grants a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) activity.
name: Positive Luminance
